name: Space Trip-Tamine
description:
Retro endless space shooter. 

Controls---

controller support.

Keyboard keys are directions or w,a,s,d for movement and space or left mouse button for shooting.

Strategy---

It's all about life management. Power ups don't cancel each other out but the same power up does not stack. max health is 200 with health pickup and 150 without.  Killing an enemy provides you with 1 hp from the leech ability in your weapon.

players with the shield power, full health + health bonus pickup will have a total of 3 hit protection from normal shots. if you kill an enemy after dropping health to 100hp then you'll have 101 and will be able to take an additional hit.

Power ups---

 Health - This increases your max health to 200hp but your life leech power will only work up to 150hp still.

 shield - takes a single hit from any attack for free. Lasts until you get hit.

 Laser Storm- unleashes a flurry of lasers on the screen killing things much much faster.
